Public education and awareness regarding issues affecting chihuahuas.

Our Mission

Chihuahua Rescue Transport (CRT) is a non-profit organization dedicated to saving chihuahuas by placing them in foster homes and supporting them until they are ready to be matched with their forever homes.

Chihuahuas most in need

Louie

Help ease Louie's pain from hydrocephalus.

Daisy

A sweet gal with special needs.

Callie

A forever foster with a sad story.

Happy Tails

Read about our most recent adoptions!

You may know Amelia from her viral TikTok video from when she was in her foster home. We are now happy to announce that she has found her forever home with Sarah! Amelia is the sweetest little girl who loves people and quickly became...

Our Impact

10000+ animals saved

We have placed thousands of Chihuahuas and Chihuahua mixes in approved homes since 1996.

2000+ Heartworm treatments

We take in heartworm-positive dogs and support them through their journey to becoming heartworm-free.

Hundreds of Volunteers

Foster volunteers are our most important asset because they support dogs on their path to their forever home.

Countless Forever Homes

Over the years, so many chihuahuas have been adopted out to great homes. Please consider applying for your new friend today!

SUPPORT US CRT is a nonprofit, public charity. We have no paid employees. Please consider supporting us through a donation or on a volunteer basis.
